p: Compounds were identified by using the mass spectral libraries [ 9], FFNSC 2, W9N11, and ESSENTIAL OILS (available in MassFinder 3) and the Kovats Retention Indices (KRI) of the compounds based on n-alkane series. We only considered compounds which had a mass spectral similarity more than 70% respected to those present in our digital libraries and which had a calculated Kovats index Â± 10 compared to available data bases [ 9, 10] and Nist11.
